item.title: Managing Users
item.description: Introduction Since its inception, Microcks relies on a third party component named Keycloak for managing security related topics like users identification, users authentication and habilitations as well as API endpoints protection.

item.title: External Secrets
item.description: Introduction Starting with Microcks version 0.7.0, we add the ability to manage some forms of Secrets in order to access private HTTP(S) repositories su as Git ones.

item.title: Repository Snapshots
item.description: Introduction Microcks allows users to export a part of its database as a Snapshot and import such a Snapshot within another instance.

item.title: External Dependencies
item.description: Introduction Microcks is able to run Groovy scripts contained in your API mocks.
